qas.question: Which team calls heads or tails in the coin flip before a CFL game?
Who on a football team articulates the team's decision following the coin flip?
What can the team that wins the coin toss choose besides whether they wish to kick off or receive the ball?

answers.text: which direction of the field to play in

qas.question: Who makes a choice after the team that wins the coin toss has made their decision?
What does the official call at the beginning of a game?

plausible_answers.text: having first choice, or of deferring first choice to the other captain

qas.question: What option does the official have after winning the coin toss?

plausible_answers.text: to kick to begin the first half and receive to begin the second.

qas.question: What's typical for the team that recieves the kick?

plausible_answers.text: the captain that did not have first choice in the first half is given first choice

qas.question: After the kickoff in the second half who is given first choice?

plausible_answers.text: which direction of the field to play in

qas.question: What is one option the opposing captain is given  if they choose first choice after winning the coin toss?

context: At the beginning of a match, an official tosses a coin and allows the captain of the <a0_0>visiting<a0_0/> team call <b4_0>heads or tails<b4_0/>. The <a1_0>captain<a1_0/> of the team winning the coin toss is given the option of <b5_0>having first choice, or of deferring first choice to the other captain<b5_0/>. The captain making first choice may either choose a) to kick off or receive the kick and the beginning of the half, or b) <a2_0><b8_0>which direction of the field to play in<b8_0/><a2_0/>. The remaining choice is given to <a3_0>the opposing captain<a3_0/>. Before the resumption of play in the second half, <b7_0>the captain that did not have first choice in the first half is given first choice<b7_0/>. Teams usually choose to defer, so it is typical for the team that wins the coin toss <b6_0>to kick to begin the first half and receive to begin the second.
